main event: A C-47 pilot and copilot reported sighting an unidentified blue object near the Pacific Ocean on 12 August 1954.
interesting points: The object varied in color from bright blue to dark blue, giving the impression of pulsing or flashing.,The object approached the aircraft at high speed from about 100 feet in altitude.,The estimated size of the object was 60 to 100 feet in diameter.,The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes.,There were multiple incidents reported over the Pacific Ocean regarding unidentified flying objects.
witness description: Pilot and copilot of a C-47 aircraft
